tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE in_game_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_type VARCHAR(20),
  event_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Progress (
    player_id INT,
    quest_id INT,
    progress_status ENUM('started', 'completed', 'abandoned'),
    progress_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, quest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quests (
    quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quest_name VARCHAR(255),
    quest_description TEXT,
    quest_reward VARCHAR(100),
    quest_difficulty INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id INT,
    quest_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    progress_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Quests (
  quest_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  quest_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  quest_description TEXT,
  quest_difficulty VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  quest_start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  quest_end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Players (
  player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  player_level INT DEFAULT 1,
  player_experience INT DEFAULT 0,
  player_join_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
